data.title: Message of congratulations from Alec Douglas-Home to Hastings Kamuzu Banda (3 July 1964)
meta_keywords: message of congratulations from alec douglas-home to hastings kamuzu banda (3 july 1964)
data.meta_description: In a telegram dated 3 July 1964, the Commonwealth Relations Office sends the Malawi Government a message of congratulations from British Prime Minister Alec Douglas-Home to Malawi Prime Minister Hastings Kamuzu Banda for the countryâ€™s independence on 6 July 1964.
